data.headline: California storm: Overnight forecast sees gusty winds up to 80 mph

The eye of the “bomb cyclone” bringing an intense winter storm to California will remain offshore, but its impacts have landed with full force. Nearly 100,000 PG&E customers are impacted by power outages around the Bay Area.
